amendment.description: To strike the provision relating to required funding of new accruals under air carrier pension plans.

action.text: SA 4587 fell when SA 4585 was withdrawn.

Amendment SA 4587 proposed by Senator Durbin to Amendment SA 4585. (consideration: CR S3554-3559, S3560-3581; text: CR S3554) To strike the provision relating to required funding of new accruals under air carrier pension plans.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4587 proposed by Senator Durbin to Amendment SA 4585.
